summary: This mod replaces many vanilla NPC's in Skyrim with people from Game of Thrones.
descriptionHtml:
I liked the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65102]Game of Thrones Replacer Mod[/url]﻿ and wanted to finish it. I can't make them look perfectly like the actors with Creation Kit, but they look close. There are probably a few I forgot to type into the list, there are so many. This is my first real mod. This won't work with most mods that change the vanilla npcs because I have changed so many of them. If there is an error look for a mod like that. I made a lot of NPCs into followers and marriable. That might mess with the quests if an important npc is following you around so be careful. You can look on the wiki to see every quest you need the character for. If the name on here doesn't say anything about being changed it's probably a new NPC so you won't have to worry about the quests. I had to go through every follower again and fix their AI, so if you downloaded it before you should get the new version. You might need to give them a sword. Most NPCs I put in that they don't affect your stealth, hopefully that works because it's so hard to sneak with a follower.

You will need these mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57326/?]Iron Throne[/url]﻿

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27301/?]Game of Thrones Armor Compilation[/url]﻿

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60078/?]Westero Rim[/url]

You might need ApachiiHair 1.6 full and female 1.5. In the original mod it didn't say anything about needing it and it seems to work alright but I have the mod already. These are the people I changed:


[b]Solitude / King's Landing [/b] (Mostly in Blue Palace)

High King Torygg into Robert Baratheon (you will not find him in the blue palace because he is dead i put him there for the picture)
Jarl Elisif into Cersei Lannister
Thane Erikur into Jaime Lannister
Thane Bryling into Myrcella Baratheon
Falk Firebeard into Lord Petyr Bealish aka littlefinger
Bolgeir Bearclaw into Sandor and Gregor Clegaine aka The Hound and The Mountain 
General Tullius into Tywin Lannister
Ahtar (the solitude executioner) into Sir Illyn Payne
Captain Aldis into Meryn Trant
Gendry that replace Beirand in Solitude

Tommen Baratheon
Tyrion Lannister

Una into Ros

Roggveir into Eddard Stark, they execute him when you first go to Solitude.
